metadata.synopsis: This mercenary is guarding the entrance to a supply of incredibly rare and explosive material. She's trying to strike a more reasonable tone than the other guard we speak to.

0.speaker: Erna
0.text: You don't want to go in there. Really.
0.context: NodeContext: Flat, more serious. The previous warning was an attempt to be friendly, but we're pushing our luck now and the humour's gone.

1.speaker: Erna
1.text: Wouldn't go in there, 'less you fancy blowing your bones all the way to Baldur's Gate.
1.context: NodeContext: Reasonable - making a joke of the fact that the whole temple could explode if you upset any of the smokepowder.
